name: 16 Darkplace street
description:
16 Darkplace street is a 2d horror experience designed to  resemble the old Atari games of yesteryear. In it you play as David and you will explore your childhood home ,which was abandoned long ago, after the neighbor saw… something in the window. Explore, find diary entries, and make peace with your past

Game is available for Windows for the price of absolutely free. 

Available at both itch.io and gamejolt. 

The first project by Hatsoff studios. 

If you like the game or want to give some feedback please email us at 

16darkplacestreetthegame@gmail.com
